downloadTitle: System Center 1801+ Integration Pack for IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNIbus
downloadDescription: The Integration Pack for IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNibus is an add-on for System Center 1801 Orchestrator that enables you to create activities within runbooks that make requests to the IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNibus products to get data or perform functions.
detailsSection:
The Integration Pack for IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNibus is an add-on for System Center 1801 Orchestrator that enables you to create activities within runbooks that make requests to the IBM Tivoli Netcool/OMNibus products to get data or perform functions.

Feature Summary
The Integration Pack includes the following activities:
  • Create Alert
  • Delete Alert
  • Get Alerts
  • Monitor Alert
  • Update Alert

Release History
  • 12 February 2018 - Original English release, version 7.3.20.0
systemRequirementsSection:
Other Software: System Center 1801 - Orchestrator and future releases

    Other Requirements:
    • RAM – minimum 1GB recommended 2GB
    • Disk space minimum 200MB
    • CPU Dual Core or better
    • .Net 3.5
installInstructionSection: Download the package and extract the files to your computer by running the .exe.
